items.sentence: Tom has decided to have his house repainted.
Tom tried volleyball, but he didn't like it.
It appears Tom doesn't know what he's doing.
Tom went to the library every day last week.
That isn't the reason that I came to Boston.
Tom reached out and took Mary's hand in his.
She was robbed of her money on her way home.
She was anxious about her children's health.
She was by far the best singer in the class.
She was chosen from ten thousand applicants.
She was indignant when I said she was lying.
I wonder why John is always late for school.
When was the last time you tried doing that?
Tom was in his room all afternoon, studying.
I admire the way you never lose your temper.
I admire your courage and your fearlessness.
I didn't recognize the song Tom was singing.
The workers are considering going on strike.
Are you ready to take responsibility for it?
My friend sent me a letter asking how I was.
